Item.Title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
Burton + Depp + Carter = Todd
Item.Description: The relationship of director Tim Burton with actors Johnny Depp and Helena Bonham Carter will be featured as they meet the formidable challenge of adapting the musical saga of Sweeney Todd.

Item.Title: Sweeney Todd Is Alive: The Real History Of The Demon Barber
Item.Description: Examine the facts and fiction behind the legendary story of Sweeney Todd through interviews with crime historians, celebrated writers and well-known personalities.

Item.Title: Sweeney's London
Item.Description: An exclusive guided tour of the location of Sweeney Todd's hideous crimes.

Item.Title: Grand Guignol: A Theatrical Tradition
Item.Description: A retrospective that introduces us to the history of French Grand Guignol theatre (pronounced 'Grahn Geen-Yol'), which refers to any dramatic entertainment that deals with macabre subject matter and features over-the-top graphic violence.

Item.Title: Musical Mayhem: Sondheim's Sweeney Todd
Item.Description: Explore the fertile mind of Stephen Sondheim and his prolific legacy in American musical theatre through extensive interviews with the composer. Learn how he adapted a small horror play into a colossal macabre musical production.

Item.Title: Designs For A Demon Barber
Item.Description: Set decorator Francesca Lo Schiavo along with her key collaborators. In particular costume designer Colleen Atwood, discusses the sets of early 19th century London created for Sweeney Todd.

Item.Title: A Bloody Business
Item.Description: Behind-the-scenes look at how the bloody throat slitting effects were created.

Item.Title: The Making Of Sweeney Todd - HBO First Look
London Press Conference
Item.Description: The cast of Sweeney Todd answer questions from the press in London.
